verses.verse: <S%H8671>Again,<s%> in the ninth <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3789>write<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3117>day,<s%> even of this <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5564>drew<s%> close to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> this <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

<S%H4911>Utter<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> to the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> Set <S%H8239>on<s%> the <S%H5518>caldron,<s%> set it <S%H8239>on,<s%> and also <S%H3332>pour<s%> water into <S%H4325>it:<s%>

<S%H622>gather<s%> its <S%H5409>pieces<s%> into <S%H2896>it,<s%> even every good <S%H5409>piece,<s%> the <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> and the <S%H3802>shoulder;<s%> <S%H4390>fill<s%> it with the <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H6106>bones.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H4005>choice<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and also a pile of <S%H1754>wood<s%> for the <S%H6106>bones<s%> under the <S%H7570>caldron;<s%> make it boil <S%H7571>well;<s%> <S%H6106>yes,<s%> let its bones be <S%H1310>boiled<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H188>Woe<s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> to the <S%H5518>caldron<s%> whose <S%H2457>rust<s%> is <S%H2457>therein,<s%> and whose rust is not gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H3318>it!<s%> take out of it <S%H5409>piece<s%> after <S%H5409>piece;<s%> No <S%H1486>lot<s%> is fallen on <S%H5307>it.<s%>

For her <S%H1818>blood<s%> is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H7760>her;<s%> she set it on the <S%H6706>bare<s%> <S%H5553>rock;<s%> she <S%H8210>didn't<s%> pour it on the <S%H776>ground,<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> it with <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

That it may cause <S%H2534>wrath<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5358>take<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> her <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H6706>bare<s%> <S%H5553>rock,<s%> that it should not be <S%H3680>covered.<s%>
Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H188>Woe<s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city!<s%> I also will make the <S%H4071>pile<s%> <S%H1431>great.<s%>

<S%H7235>Heap<s%> on the <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H1814>make<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H4841>hot,<s%> boil well the <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and make <S%H7543>thick<s%> the <S%H4841>broth,<s%> and let the <S%H6106>bones<s%> be <S%H2787>burned.<s%>

Then <S%H5975>set<s%> it <S%H7386>empty<s%> on its <S%H1513>coals,<s%> that it may be <S%H3179>hot,<s%> and its <S%H5178>brass<s%> may <S%H2787>burn,<s%> and that its <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> may be <S%H5413>molten<s%> in <S%H8432>it,<s%> that its <S%H2457>rust<s%> may be <S%H8552>consumed.<s%>

She has <S%H3811>wearied<s%> herself with <S%H8383>toil;<s%> yet her <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2457>rust<s%> <S%H3318>doesn't<s%> go forth out of <S%H2457>her;<s%> her rust <S%H784>doesn't<s%> go forth by fire.

In your <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> is <S%H2154>lewdness:<s%> because I have <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> you and you <S%H2891>weren't<s%> cleansed, you shall not be <S%H2891>cleansed<s%> from your <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> any <S%H2534>more,<s%> until I have caused my wrath toward you to <S%H5117>rest.<s%>

<S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H935>it:<s%> it shall happen, and I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6544>it:<s%> I will not go back, neither will I <S%H2347>spare,<s%> neither will I <S%H5162>repent;<s%> according to your <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and according to your <S%H5949>doings,<s%> shall they <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5002>you,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
Also the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>behold,<s%> I will take away from you the <S%H4261>desire<s%> of your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> with a <S%H4046>stroke:<s%> yet you shall neither <S%H5594>mourn<s%> nor <S%H1058>weep,<s%> neither shall your <S%H1832>tears<s%> run <S%H935>down.<s%>

<S%H602>Sigh,<s%> but <S%H1826>not<s%> <S%H6213>aloud,<s%> make no <S%H60>mourning<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead;<s%> <S%H2280>bind<s%> your <S%H6287>headdress<s%> on <S%H5275>you,<s%> and put your shoes <S%H7760>on<s%> your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H5844>don't<s%> cover your <S%H8222>lips,<s%> and <S%H398>don't<s%> eat <S%H582>men<s%>'s <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

So I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and at <S%H6153>even<s%> my <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H4191>died;<s%> and I <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> as I was <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>
The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5046>me,<s%> Won't you tell us what these things are to <S%H6213>us,<s%> that you do so?
Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1697>them,<s%> The word of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H559>Speak<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H2490>Behold,<s%> I will profane my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of your <S%H5797>power,<s%> the <S%H4261>desire<s%> of your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and that which your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H4263>pities;<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> whom you have <S%H5800>left<s%> behind shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> as I have <S%H6213>done:<s%> you shall not <S%H5844>cover<s%> your <S%H8222>lips,<s%> nor <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H582>men.<s%>

Your <S%H6287>tires<s%> shall be on your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> on your <S%H7272>feet:<s%> you shall not <S%H5594>mourn<s%> nor <S%H1058>weep;<s%> but you shall pine <S%H4743>away<s%> in your <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> and <S%H5098>moan<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> toward <S%H251>another.<s%>

Thus <S%H3168>Ezekiel<s%> shall be a <S%H4159>sign<s%> to <S%H6213>you;<s%> according to all that he has done, you will <S%H6213>do.<s%> When this <S%H935>comes,<s%> then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> shall it not be in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H3947>take<s%> from them their <S%H4581>strength,<s%> the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of their <S%H8597>glory,<s%> the <S%H4261>desire<s%> of their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and that whereupon they <S%H4853>set<s%> their <S%H5315>heart,<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters,<s%>
that in that <S%H3117>day<s%> he who <S%H6412>escapes<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H2045>you,<s%> to cause you to hear it with your <S%H241>ears?<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> will be <S%H6605>opened<s%> to him who has <S%H6412>escaped,<s%> and you shall <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and be no more <S%H481>mute:<s%> so you will be a <S%H4159>sign<s%> to <S%H3045>them;<s%> and they shall know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
